title: 2013 image from a website
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126110510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/step2_5705.png)

I don't know if this is all the same font. The rounded apostrophe is interesting.

Thank you!
author: eaable

comments.content:
It’s all Proxima Nova, by Mark Simonson:  
 [http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126110510/http:/www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova "http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova")
